scripts.build: npm run build-lambdaSQSHandler; npm run build-lambdaAPI; npm run build-lambdaUpdater; npm run build-lambdaScheduled;
scripts.build-lambdaSQSHandler: mkdir -p ../dist; rm -f ../dist/sqshandler.zip; cp -r ./lambdaSQSHandler ../dist; cd ../dist/lambdaSQSHandler; zip -r ../sqshandler.zip ./; cd ..; rm -rf lambdaSQSHandler
scripts.build-lambdaAPI: mkdir -p ../dist; rm -f ../dist/api.zip; cp -r ./lambdaAPI ../dist; cp package.json ../dist/lambdaAPI; cd ../dist/lambdaAPI; npm install --production; zip -r ../api.zip ./; cd ..; rm -rf lambdaAPI
scripts.build-lambdaUpdater: mkdir -p ../dist; rm -f ../dist/updater.zip; cp -r ./lambdaUpdater ../dist; cp package.json ../dist/lambdaUpdater; cd ../dist/lambdaUpdater; npm install --production; zip -r ../updater.zip ./; cd ..; rm -rf lambdaUpdater
scripts.build-lambdaScheduled: mkdir -p ../dist; rm -f ../dist/scheduled.zip; cp -r ./lambdaScheduled ../dist; cp package.json ../dist/lambdaScheduled; cd ../dist/lambdaScheduled; npm install --production; zip -r ../scheduled.zip ./; cd ..; rm -rf lambdaScheduled
scripts.serve: rm -rf ./temp ; mkdir -p ./temp ; NODE_ENV=development UserPool=us-west-2_eBnYkrtNi PoolClient=u42sllobpaakqs5n8ell7omt5 nodemon --watch ./lambdaAPI --watch ./lambdaUpdater local
